campus_security.lost_and_found_office: The official Lost and Found collection point is located at the **Main Gate Security Office**, available 24/7.
campus_security.lost_item_instruction: To report a lost item, please use the online Lost Item Report Form available below. If you found an item, please bring it to the Main Gate Security Office.
campus_security.incident_reporting_instruction: To report a non-emergency incident (e.g., vandalism, noise complaint), please use the online Incident Reporting Form available below.
campus_security.immediate_contact_number: For urgent matters or immediate security assistance, call the Campus Security Hotline at **(043) 987-6543** (Local 100).
campus_security.emergency_response: In case of fire or a medical emergency, follow evacuation protocols and call **911** (for external assistance) or the Campus Security Hotline.
campus_security.parking_rules: Parking is restricted to designated areas only. Unauthorized vehicles will be clamped. Obtain a parking permit from the Admin office.
campus_security.visitor_policy: All visitors must present a valid ID and register at the Main Gate. They must be accompanied by a UBLC staff or faculty member while inside the campus.
